overview: Adam & Eve bring us this feature length collection of sexual revelations, directed by Mickey Mod. The Luck of the Draw centers around Siouxsie Q's adult radio talk show, in which guests are invited to share their secrets and sexual fantasies. There's a huge variety of scenes, including a lesbian love triangle, a married couple trying to shake things up and a photo shoot that turns X-rated. The film is modern, interesting; even the intro is sleek and edgy. At 1.5 hours there is something for every taste, starring Mickey himself and a large cast of well-known adult performers.
title: The Luck of the Draw
